Package GUI

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.CellSocietyPane
      • GUI.Simulation
  • public class Simulation
extends CellSocietyPane
    Author:
    riley The simulation class is responsible for runnign simulations and displaying the UI to the user. It depends on the cell society pane class. use this class as an instance var for the main window.

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
